title: RHONJ #Justice4Dolores + RHOD Finale Recap!
itunes:title: RHONJ #Justice4Dolores + RHOD Finale Recap!

description:
Danny is injured this week, but nevertheless persists with an all-new episode breaking down this week's Real Housewives of New Jersey, which featured a golf butt-kissing, and Dolores v. J*e G*rga. On The Real Housewives of Dallas finale, the murder mystery party ends, Kary and Brandi ruin a TV landmark, and more! Danny also touches on the reunion trailer, Vanderpump baby news, and the new season of VPR!


RHOD: 16:26ish


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
